data.text: @RobinAdamsZA @GasantAbarder I love the spirit, and your support ❤️ baby steps. Hoping for a full recovery in no time xx
@razeenallie Rude. You must say hi to all people you think you know. Habit mos.
@RobinAdamsZA Wasnt sure if it was u so thats why I didnt say hi lol
@razeenallie A gentle little run, walk, run, walk...

@GasantAbarder Any day of the week, every damn time. He used to run 100km for charity.
JT was our pace setter at the Istanbul Marathon. He hasn't run in a year and a half. 
So he and I are starting something new. Baby steps.
Tomorrow it's the 10km Lighthouse race in Sea Point. Wish us luck. 🙏🏽 https://t.co/Ypdf36nSK4
